description.value:
Your existence is an anomaly that defies the normal parameters of your current reality. You might have encountered something that disrupted your core existence, or you crossed the veil from an alternate reality or twisted timeline.

Tradition arcane

Paradox Skill Deception

Paradox Spells cantrip: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.jgN33YSYXB8iIHTw]{Stumble}; 1st: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.7P4eBdqWcgQJAFCa]{Shifting Surge}; 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic}; 3rd: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.qkehzRdn7JeGrR6E]{Void Whispers}; 4th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.jyrxfWeeCsrkhNit]{Eldritch Wrath}; 5th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kOa055FIrO9Smnya]{Wall of Stone}; 6th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.a02hsymtiVRQvh3i]{Slice Reality}; 7th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.zdzeVZlKHkMAt2Rf]{Death Sentence}; 8th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.sTpdXXaaKhoGOIxh]{Void Vessel}; 9th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.J3zMwmhIVgI2yzxm]{Call Cosmos}

Warp Spells initial: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.TN2pHF9l3k4ZJ7di]{Warp Terrain}; advanced: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.9w90nlUdV5HBRWFm]{Warp World}; greater: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.XoYUZP9OYdDMz4I0]{Parallel Forms}

Quantum Field Movements blur as images of alternate iterations of your enemies flicker around them. When an enemy in your quantum field attempts an action with the concentrate trait, the action is disrupted unless they succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5|showDC:all]. The first time a creature fails this check, it becomes temporarily immune for 24 hours.
